Text.Page:
While you were busy with the kulkari, I did some solo scouting along the canyon walls.

I found {@LinkCreature:24#19#eldritch warpers} and {@LinkCreature:24#20#blackguards}. It's too much of a coincidence with the kulkari advancing. I'll watch the kulkari while you take them out. Bring back anything you find. We'll figure this out.

Not a single clue for you either? Hmph. I know something's going on. We'll have to keep looking.

Get some rest and don't forget to stay hydrated! If you die on me, I'll have you resurrected just so I can kick your ass.
Were you waiting for an engraved invitation? Get moving, soldier!
